metadata.Title: CVE-2020-20450 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
FFmpeg 4.2 is affected by null pointer dereference passed as argument to libavformat/aviobuf.c, which could cause a Denial of Service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-20450` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 4.4
libavcodec-extra - 4.4
libavcodec-extra58 - 4.4
libavcodec58 - 4.4
libavdevice58 - 4.4
libavfilter-extra - 4.4
libavfilter-extra7 - 4.4
libavfilter7 - 4.4
libavformat-extra - 4.4
libavformat-extra58 - 4.4
libavformat58 - 4.4
libavutil56 - 4.4
libpostproc55 - 4.4
libswresample3 - 4.4
libswscale5 - 4.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4').
